MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L21 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Hapsford Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.31AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the work required to repair the fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.25PM on 14th January 2021.
